name: Magic Tavern
description: Use your magic spell to destroy the mugs and goblets that materialize in front of you. Hit the hourglasses for some extra time!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows  10 64bit Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 or better Additional Notes: HTC VIVE only!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
